search.query: `real-time-income-information_wmf(ServiceRequestReceived)` | rex field=detail.filterFields "\((?.*)\)" | makemv Fields | makemv delim="," Fields | mvexpand Fields | eval Fields=trim(Fields) | lookup RTI.csv Fields OUTPUT Fields AS Matched | eval Matched=if(isnotnull(Matched), "Y", "N"), together=toString(Fields) + " - " + toString(Matched), TotalErr=if('Matched'="N", 1, 0) | stats sum(TotalErr) AS "Errors Per Submission" count(Matched) AS "All Fields" values(together) AS "Submitted Fields" BY _time | eval "Error Rate"=round(100*'Errors Per Submission'/'All Fields',1) | table _time "All Fields" "Errors Per Submission" "Error Rate" "Submitted Fields" "Error Rate" | fieldformat "Error Rate"=tostring('Error Rate')+"%"
